title: 93: Happy Halloween with Roz Drezfalez
itunes:title: 93: Happy Halloween with Roz Drezfalez
description:
The Broads are joined by their favorite spooky queen, Roz Drezfalez to celebrate Halloween! They hear Roz’s new sexy song and chat about psychics, mediums, halloween costumes, biggest fears, McKamey Manor, listen to some #broadsquad spooky stories, and more! 
ROZ DREZFALEZ: 
@rozdrezfalez
Check out Ghosted! by Roz Drezfalez: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghosted-by-roz-drezfalez/id1450864418
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
*** MODERN FERTILITY: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to http://modernfertility.com/chatty 
*** YOUR SUPER: Get 15% off your order when you go to yoursuper.com (http://yoursuper.com/) use code CHATTY at checkout!
*** FAB FIT FUN: Use coupon code “CHATTY" for $10 off your first box at ​www.fabfitfun.com (http://www.fabfitfun.com/) ​ #fabfitfunpartner
*** CASETIFY: Go to http://casetify.com/chatty today to get 20% off your new favorite phone case!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
